Package parsing

Class SimulationParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • parsing.SimulationParser
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.xml.sax.ContentHandler, org.xml.sax.DTDHandler, org.xml.sax.EntityResolver, org.xml.sax.ErrorHandler
    public class SimulationParser
extends org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
    This is a class to get the parameters of the simulation from the input xml file. This is a subclass of DefaultHandler
    Since:
    04-26-2019
    Author:
    John Mendonça, Manuel Domingues, Rúben Gomes

      Parsing a xml file and store the information in variables.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SimulationParser

        public SimulationParser​(java.lang.String xmlFileName,
                        Simulation sim)
        Parsing a xml file and store the information in variables. If it is detected that it is impossible to build a hamiltonian cycle, it aborts.
        Parameters:
        xmlFileName - is the name of the xml file to be parsed
        sim - is the Simulation instance

                       java.lang.String element)
                throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Method invoked when the xml parser detects the end of an element. Validates and stores the weight of an edge. Exits if the weight is not positive.

      • possibleHamiltonianCycle

        public void possibleHamiltonianCycle​(Graphs graph)
                              throws NodeWithoutTwoEdgesException
        Checks within a graph if there is at least one node that contains less than 2 adjacent nodes.
        Parameters:
        graph - is the graph whose nodes are checked.
        Throws:
        NodeWithoutTwoEdgesException - thrown when a node of the graph contains less than 2 adjacent nodes
